companyName: Innovator Lunt Low Vol/High Beta Tactical
description:
The investment seeks investment results that generally correspond (before fees and expenses) to the price and yield of the Lunt Capital U.S. Large Cap Equity Rotation Index.
 The fund generally will invest at least 80% of its total assets in the U.S.-listed large capitalization common stocks that comprise the index. The index utilizes Lunt Capital's proprietary relative strength methodology to rotate between one of two sub-indices that identify certain components of the S&P 500. The first sub-index is the S&P 500 Low Volatility Index; the second sub-index is the S&P 500 High Beta Index. The fund is non-diversified.
